alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 2:33AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * CHANGES...Updated additional snow amounts expected, and highlighted travel hazards through this morning`s commute. * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, with up to 4 inches possible in heavier snow shower bands. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Although most of the heavy snow has ended, cold temperatures will keep roads slick and icy with widespread chain requirements through this morning`s commute.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours until conditions improve later today. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
